title: Get Truckin’, but Watch Your Speed with State Bicycle Co.’s Grateful Dead collaboration
content:
Cyclists aren’t all hippies, but most of us share some common views with the long-hairs; We respect the environment, and we love to enjoy the feeling of freedom! Bike and music lovers State Bicycle Co. have just announced a Grateful Dead inspired collection of goodies, aiming to “spread good vibes and take the recent bike […]

The post Get Truckin’, but Watch Your Speed with State Bicycle Co.’s Grateful Dead collaboration appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
